title: Shadows and Fortune: Chapter 2 has landed!

embed.description: Miss Fortune snapped the barrels of her pistols shut and laid them down on the table next to her short-bladed sword. Scores of frantic bells and shouts of alarm echoed from the panicked city below; she knew well what they signified. The Harrowing.

body: Take a gander folks! Chapter two is upon us!

Perhaps the order was built in Demacia but was founded upon a combination of Ionian and Demacian traditions, or perhaps the order is so well travelled they gather the legends and methods of various cultures so they can find the most appropriate and effective means of doing things, for instances in Demacia it might be more traditional to anoint the dead so their souls are protected as part of a larger ritual, but sewing the eyes and mouth shut was easier, so they adopted the tradition from Ionia.
